00031 ##This class contains all Methods to work with the FB-XML Files
00032 #For each xml-product file you have to create an instance of "FB_XML"
00033 #in this version the sax-parser will be used
00034 class FB_XML:
00035 
00036     __LogObj = None
00037     __DOMObj = None
00038     __xml_file = ""
00039     __handler = -1     #instance of XML-handler
00040     __ProductList = None    #List of instances of read Products
00041     __AppList = None        #List of instances of read Applications
00042     __ManufactList = None   #List of instances of read Manufacturers
00043     __CommObjList = None    #List of instances of read Communication Objects
00044     __Prod2ProgrList = None #List of instances of read Product to Program
00045     __MaskList = None       #List of instances of read Mask
00046 
00047     ##Constructor
00048     #for each product file you have to create an instance of FB_XML
00049     #@param LogObj: Log-File-Object to log all events within this inctance
00050     #@param file: Path and Filename of the xml-data-file
00051     def __init__(self,LogObj,file):
00052         self.__LogObj = LogObj
00053         self.__xml_file = file
00054 
00055 
00056     ##return the current DOM-Object
00057     def getDOMObj(self):
00058         self.__DOMObj = parse(self.__xml_file)
00059         return self.__DOMObj
00060 
00061     ##save Documents to XML
00062     def SaveDocument(self):
00063         try:
00064             #self.__DOMObj = self.getDOMObj()
00065             OutFileObj = open(self.__xml_file,"w")
00066 
00067             #***************************************************************************************
00068             #products
00069             if(self.SaveElements(FB_Constants.ProductNode, self.__ProductList) == False):
00070                 self.__LogObj.NewLog("error at saving product data -> no data object available",1)
00071             #***************************************************************************************
00072             #Applications
00073             if(self.SaveElements(FB_Constants.AppNode, self.__AppList) == False):
00074                 self.__LogObj.NewLog("error at saving application data -> no data object available",1)
00075             #***************************************************************************************
00076             #Manufacturer
00077             if(self.SaveElements(FB_Constants.ManufacturerNode, self.__ManufactList) == False):
00078                 self.__LogObj.NewLog("error at saving manufacturer data -> no data object available",1)
00079             #***************************************************************************************
00080             #Communication Objects
00081             if(self.SaveElements(FB_Constants.CommObjNode, self.__CommObjList) == False):
00082                 self.__LogObj.NewLog("error at saving communications objects -> no data object available",1)
00083             #***************************************************************************************
00084             #Product to Program assignment
00085             if(self.SaveElements(FB_Constants.Prod2ProgrNode, self.__Prod2ProgrList) == False):
00086                 self.__LogObj.NewLog("error at saving Product to Program objects -> no data object available",1)
00087             #***************************************************************************************
00088             #Mask
00089             if(self.SaveElements(FB_Constants.MaskNode, self.__MaskList) == False):
00090                 self.__LogObj.NewLog("error at saving mask data -> no data object available",1)
00091 
00092             String = self.__DOMObj.toxml(encoding = "ISO-8859-1")
00093             OutFileObj.write(String)
00094             OutFileObj.close()
00095 
00096         except IOError:
00097             #LOG File
00098             self.__LogObj.NewLog(IOError.message + " " + IOError.filename + " " + IOError.errno,2)
00099 
00100     ##copy the internal data to the DOM-Obj -> save data back to file
00101     #@param NodeList: List of main-tree Elements (xml-product base data) -> see Constants
00102     #@param ElementList: List of elements which should be saved
00103     def SaveElements(self,NodeList,ElementList):
00104         try:
00105             parentNode = self.__DOMObj.documentElement
00106             SubNodeList =  parentNode.getElementsByTagName(NodeList[0])
00107 
00108             #read out data copy they into DOMObj
00109             if(ElementList <> None):
00110                 #iterate through each Product in ProductList
00111                 for i in range(len(ElementList)):
00112                     #for each element in Node: "ProductNode"
00113 
00114                     for j in range(1,len(NodeList)):
00115 
00116                         if(NodeList[0] == "manufacturer"):
00117                             Value = ElementList[i].getManufacturer(j)
00118                         elif(NodeList[0] == "hw_product"):
00119                             Value = ElementList[i].getProduct(j)
00120                         elif(NodeList[0] == "mask"):
00121                             Value = ElementList[i].getMask(j)
00122                         elif(NodeList[0] == "application_program"):
00123                             Value = ElementList[i].getApp(j)
00124                         elif(NodeList[0] == "communication_object"):
00125                             Value =  ElementList[i].getCommObj(j)
00126                         elif(NodeList[0] == "product_to_program"):
00127                             Value = ElementList[i].getProd2Prog(j)
00128 
00129                         #iterate List of Nodes within MainNode (ex. hw_product)
00130                         #find all Elements in hw_product
00131                         Element = SubNodeList[i].getElementsByTagName(NodeList[j])
00132                         #does Element-Node exist ? (different ets version-fils -> different element-counts
00133                         if(len(Element)>0):
00134                             if(NodeList[j] == Element[0].tagName):
00135                                 #save internal Value to XML-Object
00136                                 Element[0].firstChild.data = unicode(Value,"ISO-8859-1")
00137 
00138                 return True
00139             else:
00140                 return False
00141 
00142         except:
00143             self.__LogObj.NewLog("Exception at saving Elements to xml object at ",2)
00144             return False
00145 
00146 
00147     ##parse entire XML-Data-File. All Sub-Handler will be called automatically
00148     ##After that you can call all provided functions to get products,
00149     ##applications, communcations-objects etc.
00150     #@param xml-File: Path and Filename of sourcefile
00151     #@param return: return-value
00152     def parseXMLFile(self):
00153         try:
00154             self.__DOMObj = self.getDOMObj()
00155 
00156             #saxparser
00157             self.__handler = FB_XMLHandler.FB_XMLHandler(self.__LogObj)
00158             saxparser = xml.sax.make_parser()
00159             saxparser.setContentHandler(self.__handler)
00160             saxparser.parse(self.__xml_file)
00161 
00162             return self.__handler
00163         except:
00164             self.__LogObj.NewLog("General error at saxparser: " + self.__xml_file,2)
00165             return -1
00166 
00167     ##detect all Products within the given Product-Data-File
00168     #@return: List of FB_Product Instances
00169     def getProducts(self,xml_handler):
00170 
00171         try:
00172             self.__ProductList = xml_handler.getProductList()
00173             return self.__ProductList
00174 
00175         except:
00176             self.__LogObj.NewLog("Error at 'getProducts'" ,2)
00177             return -1
00178 
00179 
00180     ##detect all Applications within the given Product-Data-File
00181     #@param xml-File: Path and Filename of sourcefile
00182     #@return: List of FB_Applications Instances and Manufacturer-Data
00183     #to get Manufacturer-Data you also have to call getApplications
00184     def getApplications(self,xml_handler):
00185 
00186         try:
00187             self.__AppList = xml_handler.getAppList()
00188             self.__ManufactList = xml_handler.getManufacturerList()
00189 
00190             return [self.__AppList,self.__ManufactList]
00191 
00192         except:
00193             self.__LogObj.NewLog("Error at 'getApplications'" ,2)
00194             return -1
00195 
00196     ##detect all communication-objects within the given Product-Data-File
00197     #@param xml-File: Path and Filename of sourcefile
00198     #@return: List of FB_CommunicationObj Instances
00199     def getCommunicationObjects(self,xml_handler):
00200 
00201         try:
00202             self.__CommObjList = xml_handler.getCommObjList()
00203 
00204             return self.__CommObjList
00205 
00206         except:
00207             self.__LogObj.NewLog("Error at 'getCommunicationObjects'" ,2)
00208             return -1

00210     ##detect all product to programs assignments within the given Product-Data-File

00212     #@return: List of FB_Prod2Prog Instances

00216             self.__Prod2ProgrList = xml_handler.getProd2ProgrList()
00217 
00218             return self.__Prod2ProgrList
00219 
00220         except:

00222             return -1

00224     ##detect all mask objects within the given Product-Data-File
00225     #@param xml-File: Path and Filename of sourcefile
00226     #@return: List of FB_Mask Instances
00227     def getMask(self,xml_handler):
00228 
00229         try:
00230             self.__MaskList = xml_handler.getMaskList()
00231 
00232             return self.__MaskList
00233 
00234         except:

00236             return -1

00238 #*********************************************************************************
00239     ##craete new xml-product-data file and add root node
00240     #@param xml-Filename+Path:
00241     def CreateProductFile(self):
00242         try:
00243 
00244             #Start = """<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"ISO-8859-1\" ?>\n
00245             Start = """<?xml version=\"1.0\" ?>\n
00246                 <eib-products></eib-products>"""
00247             self.__DOMObj = minidom.parseString(Start)
00248 
00249             newDocument = self.__DOMObj.documentElement
00250 
00251             #insert all nodes through iteration of MainNodes
00252             #or choise of single nodes
00253 
00254 #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00255             #manufacturer
00256             self.CreateNode(newDocument,FB_Constants.ManufacturerNode)
00257 #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00258             #functional_entity
00259             self.CreateNode(newDocument,FB_Constants.FunctionalNode)
00260 #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00261             #bcu_type
00262             self.CreateNode(newDocument,FB_Constants.BCUNode)
00263 #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00264             #symbol
00265             self.CreateNode(newDocument,FB_Constants.SymbolNode)
00266 #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00267             #hw_product
00268             self.CreateNode(newDocument,FB_Constants.ProductNode)
00269 #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00270             #catalog_entry
00271             self.CreateNode(newDocument,FB_Constants.CatalogNode)
00272 #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00273             #medium_type
00274             self.CreateNode(newDocument,FB_Constants.MediumNode)
00275 #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00276             #mask
00277             self.CreateNode(newDocument,FB_Constants.MaskNode)
00278 #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00279            #application_program
00280             self.CreateNode(newDocument,FB_Constants.AppNode)
00281 #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00282           #virtual_device
00283             self.CreateNode(newDocument,FB_Constants.VirDeviceNode)
00284 #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00285           #product to program...
00286             self.CreateNode(newDocument,FB_Constants.Prod2ProgrNode)
00287 #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00288           #communication objects
00289             self.CreateNode(newDocument,FB_Constants.CommObjNode)
00290 #----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00291 
00292 #.....ab hier der Rest
00293 
00294             #open the new file
00295             OutFileObj = open(self.__xml_file,"w+")
00296             #write das zeugs
00297             String = self.__DOMObj.toxml(encoding = "ISO-8859-1")
00298 
00299             OutFileObj.write(String)
00300             OutFileObj.close()
00301 
00302         except IOError:
00303             #LOG File
00304             self.__LogObj.NewLog(IOError.message + " " + IOError.filename + " " + IOError.errno,2)
00305 
00306     ##craete ElementNodes at the new xml data file
00307     #@param Document: Document of the new DOM-object file
00308     #@param Element: Element which will be added
00309     def CreateNode(self,Document,Element):
00310         try:
00311             item = self.__DOMObj.createElement(Element[0])
00312             Document.appendChild(item)
00313             #SubNode-List
00314             SubNode = self.__DOMObj.getElementsByTagName(Element[0])
00315 
00316             for i in range(1,len(Element)):
00317 
00318                 text = self.__DOMObj.createTextNode(" ")
00319                 item = self.__DOMObj.createElement(Element[i])
00320                 item.appendChild(text)
00321                 SubNode[0].appendChild(item)
00322 
00323         except:
00324             #LOG File
00325             self.__LogObj.NewLog("Error at creation of Node:" + Element ,2)
